scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:api: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:node:* --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:worker: esbuild src/workers/image-processing/post-upload.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/worker.js --external:node:* --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
